label: Knight School Entrance
description:
Hubert sends John to Knight School then instructs him to head to Princess Prep afterwards to find out anything he can about the current situation.
John eventually approaches the front entrance to Knight School.  
There are multiple "knights" walking in and out wearing badges.
There are two guards at the front gate with a closed sign on it.
The guards appear to be arguing as you approach the gate.
A knight sort of stumbles about apparently having had too much to drink.

Hit 1 if you wish to approach the guards to find a way in.
Hit 2 if you wish to find some other way in, mayybe with the help of the druken knight.

Hit 0 to quit.
